scenes.description: 画面淡入,展现云雾缭绕的仙域上空,金色卷轴在空中展开,光芒闪动,背景音乐渐起。

visual.composition: Misty immortal skies with a golden scroll unfurling
visual.environment: Immortal realm sky filled with swirling clouds and golden light
visual.fx: Golden radiance and unfolding scroll effect

scenes.prompt: Xianxia opening, mist-wreathed immortal sky with a golden scroll unfurling, spiritual particles drifting, wide shot, cinematic lighting, 4K
scenes.narration: 我是云卷仙音,欢迎回来。第29集:灵族浮现·身份疑云。

scenes.description: 过了好一会儿,附近一颗大树表面青光一闪,一团翠芒浮现而出,光濛濛的莹光中,竟有一名身高不足尺许的小人。

visual.composition: After a while, nearby tree surface flashes green, emerald glow appears, in glowing light, a figure less than one chi tall

scenes.prompt: After a while, nearby tree surface flashes green, emerald glow appears, in glowing light, a figure less than one chi tall.
scenes.narration: 大树表面青光一闪，翠芒浮现而出，莹光中竟有一名身高不足尺许小人。

scenes.description: 此小人身穿绿色长裙,眉目如画,身材妙曼凹凸,竟是一名缩小了十倍的美女。

visual.composition: This small figure wears green long dress, beautiful features, graceful figure, actually a beauty shrunk ten times

scenes.prompt: This small figure wears green long dress, beautiful features, graceful figure, actually a beauty shrunk ten times.
scenes.narration: 小人身穿绿色长裙,眉目如画,身材妙曼,竟是缩小了十倍的美女。

scenes.description: 她望着韩立消失的方向,眉头微皱着。

visual.composition: She looks at direction where Han Li disappeared, frowning slightly

scenes.prompt: She looks at direction where Han Li disappeared, frowning slightly.
scenes.narration: 她望着韩立消失的方向，眉头微皱着，心中若有所思。

scenes.description: 另一团黄色光芒从某片灌木中悠悠升起,一名身材同样大小的黄袍老者诡异的浮现,手中还拄着一根白色拐杖。

visual.composition: Another yellow glow slowly rises from bushes, yellow-robed old man of same size mysteriously appears, holding white staff

scenes.prompt: Another yellow glow slowly rises from bushes, yellow-robed old man of same size mysteriously appears, holding white staff.
scenes.narration: 另一团黄色光芒从灌木中升起，黄袍老者诡异的浮现，手中拄白色拐杖。

scenes.description: 黄袍老者用不满的口气对绿光中女子说道:'天樱,刚才为何不出手。这人只是一名人族的高阶炼体士而已,你我联手完全可以轻易收拾掉他的。'

visual.composition: Yellow-robed old man says to woman in green light with dissatisfied tone: 'Tian Ying, why didn't you act just now? He's just a high-level human body cultivator, we could easily deal with him together.'

scenes.prompt: Yellow-robed old man says to woman in green light with dissatisfied tone: 'Tian Ying, why didn't you act just now? He's just a high-level human body cultivator, we could easily deal with him together.'
scenes.narration: 黄袍老者不满地对女子说道，询问为何不出手，认为这人只是高阶炼体士而已。

scenes.description: 绿裙女子瞅了老者一眼,淡淡回道:'黄石公!这次我们潜入此地,可不是为了多杀几名人族和妖族中人的。而是为了追杀本族的叛逆,追回神血的。'

visual.composition: Green-dressed woman glances at old man, calmly replies: 'Huang Shigong! We didn't infiltrate here to kill more humans and demons, but to hunt down our race's traitor and recover divine blood.'

scenes.prompt: Green-dressed woman glances at old man, calmly replies: 'Huang Shigong! We didn't infiltrate here to kill more humans and demons, but to hunt down our race's traitor and recover divine blood.'
scenes.narration: 绿裙女子淡淡回道，说明他们潜入此地是为了追杀本族叛逆，夺回神血。

scenes.description: 黄袍老者摇摇头,不太同意女子的说法,说道:'这人顶多相当于元婴期修士,你我两名灵将出手,还不是举手之劳的事情,何用顾及这么多。'

visual.composition: Yellow-robed old man shakes head, disagrees with woman, says: 'He's at most equivalent to Nascent Soul cultivator, we two Spirit Generals acting would be effortless, why care so much.'

scenes.prompt: Yellow-robed old man shakes head, disagrees with woman, says: 'He's at most equivalent to Nascent Soul cultivator, we two Spirit Generals acting would be effortless, why care so much.'
scenes.narration: 黄袍老者摇头说道，认为这人顶多相当于元婴期修士，两名灵将出手举手之劳。

scenes.description: 绿裙女子沉默了好一会儿,才说出自己的心里话来:'若真能轻易击毙此人,我也不会介意出手的。但这人却有些古怪,还是不要打草惊蛇,坏了大事的好。'

visual.composition: Green-dressed woman remains silent for a while, then says: 'If we could easily kill him, I wouldn't mind acting. But this person is strange, better not alert the enemy and ruin our mission.'

scenes.prompt: Green-dressed woman remains silent for a while, then says: 'If we could easily kill him, I wouldn't mind acting. But this person is strange, better not alert the enemy and ruin our mission.'
scenes.narration: 绿裙女子沉默一会儿，说道若真能轻易击毙此人，她也会出手，但这人有些古怪。

scenes.description: 黄石公心中一怔,急忙问道:'古怪?天樱,你发现了什么?'

visual.composition: Huang Shigong's heart startles, urgently asks: 'Strange? Tian Ying, what did you discover?'

scenes.prompt: Huang Shigong's heart startles, urgently asks: 'Strange? Tian Ying, what did you discover?'
scenes.narration: 黄石公心中一怔，急忙问道是否发现了什么，询问这人古怪在哪里。

scenes.description: 女子目光闪动一下,反问了一句:'你觉得这人真是一名炼体士吗?'

visual.composition: Woman's eyes flash, counters: 'Do you think this person is really a body cultivator?'

scenes.prompt: Woman's eyes flash, counters: 'Do you think this person is really a body cultivator?'
scenes.narration: 女子目光闪动一下，反问了一句，询问黄石公是否觉得这人真是一名炼体士而已。

scenes.description: 黄石公有些不明所以,说道:'这话什么意思?此人手持灵具就击毙结丹妖兽,身上也没有灵力波动,不是炼体士还是什么?'

visual.composition: Huang Shigong confused, says: 'What do you mean? He uses artifacts to kill Core Formation beast, no spirit power fluctuations, what else if not body cultivator?'

scenes.prompt: Huang Shigong confused, says: 'What do you mean? He uses artifacts to kill Core Formation beast, no spirit power fluctuations, what else if not body cultivator?'
scenes.narration: 黄石公不明所以，说道此人手持灵具击毙结丹妖兽，没有灵力波动，定是炼体士。

scenes.description: 女子缓缓说道:'你应该知道,我本体是木樱成灵,可以直接观察到一些常人无法观察到的东西。而这个人神识非常强大,几乎不在你我之下。'

visual.composition: Woman slowly says: 'You should know, my true form is cherry wood spirit, can directly observe things others cannot. This person's spirit sense is extremely strong, almost no less than ours.'

scenes.prompt: Woman slowly says: 'You should know, my true form is cherry wood spirit, can directly observe things others cannot. This person's spirit sense is extremely strong, almost no less than ours.'
scenes.narration: 女子缓缓说道，她本体是木樱成灵，能观察到常人无法观察的东西，此人神识强大。

scenes.description: 女子继续说道:'据我所知,人族的炼体士不可能有这般强大神识的。应该只有人族中的化神修士,才可能拥有的。'

visual.composition: Woman continues: 'As I know, human body cultivators cannot have such strong spirit sense. Only Spirit Transformation cultivators could have this.'

scenes.prompt: Woman continues: 'As I know, human body cultivators cannot have such strong spirit sense. Only Spirit Transformation cultivators could have this.'
scenes.narration: 女子继续说道，人族的炼体士不可能有这般强大神识，只有化神修士才可能拥有。

scenes.description: 黄石公脸现惊异之色,说道:'强大神识!你是说,这人不是炼体士而是一名化神期修士假扮的?'

visual.composition: Huang Shigong shows shocked expression, says: 'Strong spirit sense! You mean this person isn't body cultivator but Spirit Transformation cultivator in disguise?'

scenes.prompt: Huang Shigong shows shocked expression, says: 'Strong spirit sense! You mean this person isn't body cultivator but Spirit Transformation cultivator in disguise?'
scenes.narration: 黄石公脸现惊异之色，说道这人不是炼体士而是化神期修士假扮的，大为震惊。

scenes.description: 女子说道:'我可没说什么,我并未在这人身上发现丝毫灵力存在。不过也不排除这种可能的。毕竟人族的许多功法不在我们灵族的天赋神通之下。'

visual.composition: Woman says: 'I didn't say that, I didn't find any spirit power on him. But can't rule it out. Human techniques are no weaker than our spirit race's innate abilities.'

scenes.prompt: Woman says: 'I didn't say that, I didn't find any spirit power on him. But can't rule it out. Human techniques are no weaker than our spirit race's innate abilities.'
scenes.narration: 女子说道，她并未在这人身上发现丝毫灵力，但也不排除这种可能，人族功法不弱。

scenes.description: 女子肃然地说道:'我们此行目的是追杀叛逆,夺回神血。我可不想冒险行事,误了真正的大事。'

visual.composition: Woman solemnly says: 'Our mission is to hunt traitor and recover divine blood. I don't want to risk it and ruin the real mission.'

scenes.prompt: Woman solemnly says: 'Our mission is to hunt traitor and recover divine blood. I don't want to risk it and ruin the real mission.'
scenes.narration: 女子肃然地说道，他们此行目的是追杀叛逆，夺回神血，她不想冒险误了大事。

scenes.description: 黄袍老者认同地说道:'你说的没错。若真是化神修士的话,我们也没有十足把握击杀的。万一跑掉,可就得不偿失了。'

visual.composition: Yellow-robed old man agrees: 'You're right. If really Spirit Transformation cultivator, we don't have full certainty to kill. If he escapes, not worth it.'

scenes.prompt: Yellow-robed old man agrees: 'You're right. If really Spirit Transformation cultivator, we don't have full certainty to kill. If he escapes, not worth it.'
scenes.narration: 黄袍老者认同地说道，若真是化神修士，他们也没有十足把握击杀，得不偿失。

scenes.description: 黄袍老者又有些幸灾乐祸地说道:'不过真是如此的话,人族可真够狡诈的!那些妖族的高阶存在碰见此人可就要倒大霉了。'

visual.composition: Yellow-robed old man somewhat gleefully says: 'If true, humans are truly cunning! High-level demon beings meeting him will be in big trouble.'

scenes.prompt: Yellow-robed old man somewhat gleefully says: 'If true, humans are truly cunning! High-level demon beings meeting him will be in big trouble.'
scenes.narration: 黄袍老者幸灾乐祸地说道，若真是如此，人族可真够狡诈，妖族的高阶可要倒霉了。

scenes.description: 绿裙女子想起了什么,突然问道:'对了,铁利和赤灭二人也应该进入了此地了吧。出了这等大事,我们五行灵族都应该出动了人手。'

visual.composition: Green-dressed woman remembers something, suddenly asks: 'By the way, Tieli and Chimi should also have entered here. With such major event, all Five Element Spirit races should have sent people.'

scenes.prompt: Green-dressed woman remembers something, suddenly asks: 'By the way, Tieli and Chimi should also have entered here. With such major event, all Five Element Spirit races should have sent people.'
scenes.narration: 绿裙女子突然问道，铁利和赤灭二人也应该进入了此地，五行灵族都应出动人手。

scenes.description: 两名灵族讨论着各自的任务和计划,身影渐渐消失在密林之中。

visual.composition: Two spirit beings discuss their tasks and plans, figures gradually disappear into dense forest

scenes.prompt: Two spirit beings discuss their tasks and plans, figures gradually disappear into dense forest.
scenes.narration: 两名灵族讨论着各自的任务和计划,身影渐渐消失在密林之中。

scenes.description: 画面淡出,夜色下的仙城剪影,天空洒落灵光,画面逐渐变暗。

visual.composition: Silhouette of the immortal city beneath night, spiritual light raining from the heavens
visual.environment: Night sky, city silhouette, floating light particles

scenes.prompt: Xianxia ending, immortal city silhouette under the night sky, spiritual particles drifting down, calm mysterious atmosphere, wide shot, cinematic lighting, 4K
scenes.narration: 下一集再见。我是云卷仙音,原著作者忘语。第30集即将开始。
